ca.corefacility.gview.style.items
Enum LabelLocation

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<LabelLocation>
      ca.corefacility.gview.style.items.LabelLocation
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<LabelLocation>
public enum LabelLocation
extends java.lang.Enum<LabelLocation>

Defines the location of labels on the ruler.

Author:
aaron

Enum Constant Summary
ABOVE_BACKBONE
          Labels should be located above the backbone only.
BELOW_BACKBONE
          Labels should be located below the backbone only.
BOTH
          Labels should be located both above and below the backbone.
NONE
          No ruler labels should be drawn.
 
Method Summary
 boolean buildAbove()
          Determines the state is such that we should place labels above backbone.
 boolean buildBelow()
          Determines the state is such that we should place labels below backbone.

buildAbove

public boolean buildAbove()
Determines the state is such that we should place labels above backbone.

Returns:
True if we should place labels above backbone, false otherwise.

buildBelow

public boolean buildBelow()
Determines the state is such that we should place labels below backbone.

Returns:
True if we should place labels below backbone, false otherwise.
